text_block_list.text: From now on, the days of racing through the Twinkle Series with the assigned Umamusume begin. The name of the one who walks alongside me is――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm Matikanetannhauser, nice to meet you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I want to try running an amazing race that'll make everyone happy~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll give it my all in training! Hup, hup, hmph!
And so, the challenge of the Twinkle Series with <chrname> began!
